name: Faiz Ahmad Taiyeb
bio: Faiz Ahmad Taiyeb is a professional plumber with experience in residential and commercial plumbing. He specializes in leak repairs, pipe fittings, and water system installations, ensuring reliable and long-lasting solutions.

name: Ayesha Rahman
bio: Ayesha Rahman is a skilled tailor offering custom tailoring services for women and children. Known for her precision and eye for detail, she creates perfect fits for both traditional and modern outfits.

name: Md. Farhan Islam
bio: Md. Farhan Islam is a veteran blacksmith with a decade of experience in forging tools, gates, grills, and custom metal pieces. His durability and attention to design set his work apart.

name: Nusrat Jahan
bio: Nusrat Jahan is a passionate chef with expertise in both traditional and contemporary cuisines. She offers customized meal prep, event catering, and personal chef services, focusing on quality, hygiene, and taste.

name: Rezaul Karim
bio: Rezaul Karim has been providing professional housekeeping services for over 15 years. He specializes in deep cleaning, organization, and regular maintenance of homes and offices. His attention to detail ensures spotless and hygienic spaces.

name: Tania Akter
bio: Tania Akter is a certified electrician with experience in residential and commercial electrical repairs, installations, and safety inspections. She prioritizes safe and efficient solutions for all your electrical needs.

name: Imran Hossain
bio: Imran Hossain is a skilled cobbler known for quality shoe repairs, custom fittings, and leatherwork. With a strong reputation for durability and craftsmanship, he ensures your footwear gets a new life with every service.

name: Sabiha Mahmud
bio: Sabiha Mahmud is a creative artist specializing in watercolor, acrylics, and digital illustration. She offers commissioned artwork, mural painting, and personalized gifting services that reflect emotion, color, and craftsmanship.

name: Tanvir Ahmed
bio: Tanvir Ahmed is a skilled carpenter who specializes in furniture making, custom woodwork, and home improvement. From elegant wardrobes to sturdy cabinets, his work reflects both functionality and finesse.

name: Fatema Khanom
bio: Fatema Khanom is a professional photographer who specializes in portraits, events, and product shoots. She combines creative vision with technical expertise to capture timeless, high-quality images for every occasion.

name: Mahmudul Hasan
bio: Mahmudul Hasan is a seasoned barber offering professional grooming services, from modern fades to classic cuts and shaves. With over a decade of experience, he ensures each client walks out feeling confident and fresh.

name: Sharmin Akhter
bio: Sharmin Akhter is a passionate gardener who provides landscaping, plant care, and outdoor maintenance services. She transforms ordinary spaces into green havens with her knowledge of flora and garden aesthetics.
